attributes.action: Cheaper fuel for car users in the uk
attributes.additional_details: With the following reported in the press "http://www.thisismoney.co.uk/money/news/article-2863378/Petrol-7p-litre-cheaper-says-RAC-call-retailers-cut-prices-pump.html' I call on the MPs of the house  commons to debate and lobby Petrochemical company to lower fuel prices at the pumps for the people who use cars and haulage company as I personally feel we being ripped off.
